135.title: "The Great Atlas Implosion"
135.author: by Jim Vadeboncoeur, based on a story uncovered by Brad Elliott
135.appears_in: p. 4-7 in The Jack Kirby Collector, no. 18 (Jan. 1998).
notes: Summary: Discusses the roles of Monroe Froehlich, Jr., the American News Co., the Independent News Co., Martin Goodman and Stan Lee in Atlas comics of the 1950s.
